hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE '(^|\s|&&|;|\|)bun test(\s|$)' && ! echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'bun run test'; then echo 'Use bun run test (Vitest), not bun test (Bun runner)' >&2; exit 2; fi
if echo "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" | grep -qE '\.(ts|tsx|js|jsx|json)$'; then timeout 10s bunx biome check --write "$CLAUDE_FILE_PATHS" || true; fi
